mapper.select: SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() lastNum from tbl_member tm group by lastNum;

select board_file_id, board_file_original_name, board_file_uuid, board_file_path, board_file_size, b.board_id, board_title, board_content, board_register_date, board_update_date, board_status, board_region, m.member_id, member_email, member_name, member_nickname, member_birth, m.member_region, member_profile_uuid, member_profile_original_name, member_profile_path, member_profile_size from tbl_board_file bf left join tbl_board b on bf.board_id = b.board_id join tbl_member m on m.member_id = b.member_id where b.board_region = #{boardRegion}

select board_id, m.member_region, board_title, m.member_nickname, board_register_date, board_update_date, board_status, (select count(distinct board_id) from tbl_board) countTotalBoards from tbl_member m join tbl_board b where board_status = #{boardStatus} on m.member_id = b.member_id order by board_id desc

select board_id, board_region, board_title, m.member_nickname, board_register_date, board_update_date, board_status, (select count(distinct board_id) from tbl_board) countTotalBoards from tbl_member m join tbl_board b on m.member_id = b.member_id order by board_id desc limit 5
